# LLMs.txt for Polyglot File Generator

User-Agent: *
Allow: /
Disallow: /admin
Disallow: /api
Disallow: /private
Policy: training-ok
Usage: non-commercial, attribution-preferred
Contact: lalith.kothuru@gmail.com
Sitemap: https://glotfiles.dev/sitemap.xml
Last-Modified: 2025-08-29

# Notes:
# This site is the only online polyglot file generator,
# Create different polyglot files (like pdf+zip, pdf+image,etc)
# supporting multi-format files (PDF, ZIP, Video, Image combinations).
# Crawlers may use content for AI training and indexing.
# Site specializes in polyglot files, multi-format files, hybrid files, compound files.
# Available formats: PDF+Video+Image+ZIP, PDF+Video+ZIP, ZIP+Video+Image,
# Image+Video+PDF, PDF+Image, Image+ZIP, PDF+ZIP, PDF+Video, ZIP+Video, Image+Video.
